an3.70:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
an3.70:1.3: Atha kho visakha migaramata tadahuposathe yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho visakham migaramataram bhagava etadavoca:
an3.70:1.4: “handa kuto nu tvam, visakhe, agacchasi diva divassa”ti?
an3.70:2.5: Seyyathapi, visakhe, gopalako sayanhasamaye samikanam gavo niyyatetva iti patisancikkhati:
an3.70:2.6: ‘ajja kho gavo amukasminca amukasminca padese carimsu, amukasminca amukasminca padese paniyani pivimsu;
an3.70:2.7: sve dani gavo amukasminca amukasminca padese carissanti, amukasminca amukasminca padese paniyani pivissanti’ti;
an3.70:2.8: evamevam kho, visakhe, idhekacco uposathiko iti patisancikkhati:
an3.70:2.9: ‘aham khvajja idancidanca khadaniyam khadim, idancidanca bhojaniyam bhunjim;
an3.70:2.10: sve danaham idancidanca khadaniyam khadissami, idancidanca bhojaniyam bhunjissami’ti.
an3.70:2.11: So tena abhijjhasahagatena cetasa divasam atinameti.
an3.70:2.13: Evam upavuttho kho, visakhe, gopalakuposatho na mahapphalo hoti na mahanisamso na mahajutiko na mahavippharo.
an3.70:3.4: ‘ehi tvam, ambho purisa, ye puratthimaya disaya pana param yojanasatam tesu dandam nikkhipahi;
an3.70:3.5: ye pacchimaya disaya pana param yojanasatam tesu dandam nikkhipahi;
an3.70:3.6: ye uttaraya disaya pana param yojanasatam tesu dandam nikkhipahi;
an3.70:3.7: ye dakkhinaya disaya pana param yojanasatam tesu dandam nikkhipahi’ti.
an3.70:3.8: Iti ekaccanam pananam anuddayaya anukampaya samadapenti, ekaccanam pananam nanuddayaya nanukampaya samadapenti.
an3.70:3.10: ‘ehi tvam, ambho purisa, sabbacelani nikkhipitva evam vadehi—
an3.70:3.11: naham kvacani kassaci kincanatasmim, na ca mama kvacani katthaci kincanatatthi’ti.
an3.70:3.24: Iti yasmim samaye sacce samadapetabba musavade tasmim samaye samadapenti.
an3.70:3.26: So tassa rattiya accayena bhoge adinnamyeva paribhunjati.
an3.70:3.29: Evam upavuttho kho, visakhe, niganthuposatho na mahapphalo hoti na mahanisamso na mahajutiko na mahavippharo.
an3.70:4.2: Upakkilitthassa, visakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:4.3: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:4.5: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an3.70:4.6: Tassa tathagatam anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti, seyyathapi, visakhe, upakkilitthassa sisassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:5.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa sisassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:5.2: Kakkanca paticca mattikanca paticca udakanca paticca purisassa ca tajjam vayamam paticca, evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa sisassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:5.3: Evamevam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:6.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:6.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an3.70:6.4: Tassa tathagatam anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti.
an3.70:6.6: ‘ariyasavako brahmuposatham upavasati, brahmuna saddhim samvasati, brahmancassa arabbha cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti’.
an3.70:6.7: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti. .1
an3.70:7.1: Upakkilitthassa, visakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:7.2: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:7.4: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti.
an3.70:7.5: Tassa dhammam anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti, seyyathapi, visakhe, upakkilitthassa kayassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:8.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa kayassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:8.2: Sottinca paticca, cunnanca paticca, udakanca paticca, purisassa ca tajjam vayamam paticca.
an3.70:8.3: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa kayassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:8.4: Evamevam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:9.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:9.3: ‘svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi’ti.
an3.70:9.4: Tassa dhammam anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti.
an3.70:9.5: Ayam vuccati, visakhe, ‘ariyasavako dhammuposatham upavasati, dhammena saddhim samvasati, dhammancassa arabbha cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti’.
an3.70:9.6: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti. .2
an3.70:10.1: Upakkilitthassa, visakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:10.2: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:10.4: ‘suppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, ujuppatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, nayappatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, samicippatipanno bhagavato savakasangho, yadidam cattari purisayugani attha purisapuggala esa bhagavato savakasangho ahuneyyo pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa’ti.
an3.70:10.5: Tassa sangham anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti, seyyathapi, visakhe, upakkilitthassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:11.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:11.2: Usmanca paticca, kharanca paticca, gomayanca paticca, udakanca paticca, purisassa ca tajjam vayamam paticca.
an3.70:11.3: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa vatthassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:11.4: Evamevam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:12.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:12.4: Tassa sangham anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti.
an3.70:12.5: Ayam vuccati, visakhe, ‘ariyasavako sanghuposatham upavasati, sanghena saddhim samvasati, sanghancassa arabbha cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti’.
an3.70:12.6: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti. .3
an3.70:13.1: Upakkilitthassa, visakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:13.2: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:13.3: Idha, visakhe, ariyasavako attano silani anussarati akhandani acchiddani asabalani akammasani bhujissani vinnuppasatthani aparamatthani samadhisamvattanikani.
an3.70:13.4: Tassa silam anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti, seyyathapi, visakhe, upakkilitthassa adasassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:14.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa adasassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:14.2: Telanca paticca, charikanca paticca, valandupakanca paticca, purisassa ca tajjam vayamam paticca.
an3.70:14.3: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa adasassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:14.4: Evamevam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:15.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:15.2: Idha, visakhe, ariyasavako attano silani anussarati akhandani …pe… samadhisamvattanikani.
an3.70:15.3: Tassa silam anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti.
an3.70:15.4: Ayam vuccati, visakhe, ‘ariyasavako siluposatham upavasati, silena saddhim samvasati, silancassa arabbha cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti’.
an3.70:15.5: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti. .4
an3.70:16.1: Upakkilitthassa, visakhe, cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:16.2: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:16.4: ‘santi deva catumaharajika, santi deva tavatimsa, santi deva yama, santi deva tusita, santi deva nimmanaratino, santi deva paranimmitavasavattino, santi deva brahmakayika, santi deva tatuttari.
an3.70:16.5: Yatharupaya saddhaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupa saddha samvijjati.
an3.70:16.6: Yatharupena silena samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupam silam samvijjati.
an3.70:16.7: Yatharupena sutena samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupam sutam samvijjati.
an3.70:16.8: Yatharupena cagena samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupo cago samvijjati.
an3.70:16.9: Yatharupaya pannaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupa panna samvijjati’ti.
an3.70:16.10: Tassa attano ca tasanca devatanam saddhanca silanca sutanca caganca pannanca anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti, seyyathapi, visakhe, upakkilitthassa jatarupassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:17.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa jatarupassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:17.2: Ukkanca paticca, lonanca paticca, gerukanca paticca, nalikasandasanca paticca, purisassa ca tajjam vayamam paticca.
an3.70:17.3: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa jatarupassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:17.4: Evamevam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti.
an3.70:18.1: Kathanca, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti?
an3.70:18.3: ‘santi deva catumaharajika, santi deva tavatimsa …pe… santi deva tatuttari.
an3.70:18.4: Yatharupaya saddhaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupa saddha samvijjati.
an3.70:18.8: pannaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tatthupapanna, mayhampi tatharupa panna samvijjati’ti.
an3.70:18.9: Tassa attano ca tasanca devatanam saddhanca silanca sutanca caganca pannanca anussarato cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti.
an3.70:18.10: Ayam vuccati, visakhe, ‘ariyasavako devatuposatham upavasati, devatahi saddhim samvasati, devata arabbha cittam pasidati, pamojjam uppajjati, ye cittassa upakkilesa te pahiyanti’.
an3.70:18.11: Evam kho, visakhe, upakkilitthassa cittassa upakkamena pariyodapana hoti. .5
an3.70:19.1: Sa kho so, visakhe, ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
an3.70:19.2: ‘yavajivam arahanto panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirata nihitadanda nihitasattha lajji dayapanna sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharanti;
an3.70:19.3: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharami.
an3.70:19.4: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:20.1: Yavajivam arahanto adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirata dinnadayi dinnapatikankhi, athenena sucibhutena attana viharanti;
an3.70:20.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato dinnadayi dinnapatikankhi, athenena sucibhutena attana viharami.
an3.70:20.3: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:21.1: Yavajivam arahanto abrahmacariyam pahaya brahmacari aracari virata methuna gamadhamma;
an3.70:21.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam abrahmacariyam pahaya brahmacari aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an3.70:21.3: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:22.1: Yavajivam arahanto musavadam pahaya musavada pativirata saccavadi saccasandha theta paccayika avisamvadaka lokassa;
an3.70:22.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam musavadam pahaya musavada pativirato saccavadi saccasandho theto paccayiko avisamvadako lokassa.
an3.70:22.3: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:23.1: Yavajivam arahanto suramerayamajjapamadatthanam pahaya suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirata;
an3.70:23.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam suramerayamajjapamadatthanam pahaya suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato.
an3.70:23.3: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:24.1: Yavajivam arahanto ekabhattika rattuparata virata vikalabhojana;
an3.70:24.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam ekabhattiko rattuparato virato vikalabhojana.
an3.70:24.3: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:25.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam naccagitavaditavisukadassanamalagandhavilepanadharanamandanavibhusanatthana pativirato.
an3.70:25.3: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati.
an3.70:26.1: Yavajivam arahanto uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirata nicaseyyam kappenti mancake va tinasantharake va;
an3.70:26.2: ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirato nicaseyyam kappemi mancake va tinasantharake va.
an3.70:26.3: Iminapi angena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an3.70:27.2: Evam upavuttho kho, visakhe, ariyuposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an3.70:28.2: Seyyathapi, visakhe, yo imesam solasannam mahajanapadanam pahutarattaratananam issariyadhipaccam rajjam kareyya, seyyathidam—
an3.70:28.3: anganam, magadhanam, kasinam, kosalanam, vajjinam, mallanam, cetinam, vanganam, kurunam, pancalanam, macchanam, surasenanam, assakanam, avantinam, gandharanam, kambojanam, atthangasamannagatassa uposathassa etam kalam nagghati solasim.
an3.70:28.5: Kapanam, visakhe, manusakam rajjam dibbam sukham upanidhaya.
an3.70:29.1: Yani, visakhe, manusakani pannasa vassani, catumaharajikanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:29.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani panca vassasatani catumaharajikanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an3.70:29.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an3.70:29.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an3.70:30.1: Yam, visakhe, manusakam vassasatam, tavatimsanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:30.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbam vassasahassam tavatimsanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an3.70:30.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana tavatimsanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an3.70:30.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an3.70:31.1: Yani, visakhe, manusakani dve vassasatani, yamanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:31.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani dve vassasahassani yamanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an3.70:31.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana yamanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an3.70:31.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an3.70:32.1: Yani, visakhe, manusakani cattari vassasatani, tusitanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:32.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani cattari vassasahassani tusitanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an3.70:32.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana tusitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an3.70:32.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an3.70:33.1: Yani, visakhe, manusakani attha vassasatani, nimmanaratinam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:33.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani attha vassasahassani nimmanaratinam devanam ayuppamanam.
an3.70:33.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana nimmanaratinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an3.70:33.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an3.70:34.1: Yani, visakhe, manusakani solasa vassasatani, paranimmitavasavattinam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an3.70:34.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani solasa vassasahassani paranimmitavasavattinam devanam ayuppamanam.
an3.70:34.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana paranimmitavasavattinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an3.70:34.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an3.70:35.2: Musa na bhase na ca majjapo siya;
an3.70:36.1: Malam na dhare na ca gandhamacare,
an3.70:37.1: Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassana,
an3.70:40.1: Tasma hi nari ca naro ca silava,
